achievements.completeMaze: Complete 25 levels of Maze with a minimum board size of 5x5
achievements.completeMoreMaze: Complete 20 levels of Maze with a minimum board size of 20x20
achievements.completeManyMaze: Complete 15 levels of Maze with a minimum board size of 30x30
achievements.completeTotalMaze: Complete 10 levels of Maze with a minimum board size of 35x35
achievements.scoreBallHole: Score 50 points in Ball in the hole
achievements.scoreMoreBallHole: Score 40 points in Ball in the hole
achievements.scoreManyBallHole: Score 30 points in Ball in the hole
achievements.scoreTotalBallHole: Score 20 points in Ball in the hole
achievements.winTicTacToe: Win 10 games of Tic Tac Toe
achievements.winMoreTicTacToe: Win 20 games of Tic Tac Toe
achievements.winManyTicTacToe: Win 40 games of Tic Tac Toe
achievements.winTotalTicTacToe: Win 80 games of Tic Tac Toe
